message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
